title: Monday Post Show (06-06-22)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (06-06-22)
description:
A caller has a question about Bobby purchasing Raymundo’s “yeaaaah” from him as an NFT. We get an update from everyone’s weekend. Amy went to a wedding, Eddie went had a one-on-one day with his oldest son and Bobby watched a lot of Arkansas baseball. Raymundo ran into a celebrity in an elevator. We get an update on the Celebrity Softball game drama tonight and why Lunchbox is upset about the Sore Losers CMA event.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
A caller has a question about Bobby purchasing Raymundo’s “yeaaaah” from him as an NFT. We get an update from everyone’s weekend. Amy went to a wedding, Eddie went had a one-on-one day with his oldest son and Bobby watched a lot of Arkansas baseball. Raymundo ran into a celebrity in an elevator. We get an update on the Celebrity Softball game drama tonight and why Lunchbox is upset about the Sore Losers CMA event.
